summary: Comprehensive testing of GuardianFire AI system completed. All backend APIs working perfectly (15/15 tests passed). Frontend authentication, dashboard, work orders, and sensors pages all working correctly with proper data display and user interactions.

backend_issues.notes: All backend APIs functioning perfectly. AI integration working with Gemini fallback mechanism.

design_issues.issue: Missing data-testid attributes for automated testing

frontend_issues.notes: Frontend working excellently with proper authentication, navigation, and data display

passed_tests: AI risk analysis with Gemini integration
Landing page loads with proper content and login buttons
Dashboard page with risk monitoring and metrics
Work orders page with status updates functionality
Sensors page with real-time monitoring and filters
